content.title: Using Z Index to Move a Widget to the Background
content.body:
1. From the Default Library tab on the bottom left of your canvas, drag and drop the following:
    • Logo widget onto the frmFlex form on the canvas.
    • Search1 widget onto the frmFlex form on the canvas.
  2. To bring the Logo widget above the Search1 widget,
    • Select headerContainer02 from the Project explorer on the top left of your canvas.
    • From the Properties panel, expand Look > Flex on the top right of your canvas. Set the Z Index property to 2.
